title: Love Island's Amber Gill talks caring for black hair
text:
Amber Gill sent everyone wild with her new look at her Miss Pap launch party (Picture: Splash)

Amber Gill sent fans into meltdown on Thursday as she unveiled a sassy new hairdo at her Miss Pap launch party.

Looking all kinds of fierce, the Love Island winner stepped out in a much darker, longer wig, which marked a huge change from the curls we saw her rock every day in the villa.

Tthe 22-year-old winner has now lifted the lid on how exactly she keeps her natural hair looking so damn good.

Speaking exclusively to Metro.co.uk ahead of her £1million Miss Pap range launch, she said: ‘I wash it about once a week, I could push it to two weeks if I wanted to.

‘With my kind of hair, the less washes the better.

‘I just thicken it with loads of products, loads of thick, premium products, and then just leave it to air dry. That’s all I do.

‘There’s no secret tactic unfortunately, I wish there was.’

Amber lifted the lid on how she cares for her natural curls (Picture: Rex)

Petition for Amber to get her own haircare range, anyone?

The ITV2 star debuted the new style at her swanky Miss Pap launch party on Thursday, at Tape London – where she was joined by Krept & Konan.

She also gave fans a glimpse into her look on Instagram, teasing that it was the ‘beginning of her hair journey’.

‘My launch look,’ she captioned the shot for her 2.8million followers. ‘Y’all wanted straight hair so bad. And guess what I’m gon give it to ya.

‘The beginning of my hair journey. Thank you @dollhouselondon_. Thank you for always slaying my makeup @makeupbymikey (sic).’

Right on cue, fans and famous friends rushed to praise Amber’s sassy look.

‘Amazing Amber! Smashing it,’ one commented, as another screamed: ‘OMG YOU LOOK AMAZING.’

‘I have a lot of feelings right now but mostly speechless wow,’ an Instagram user said.

While co-star Anna Vakili posted: ‘Loved your hair like this.’

Us too, hun.

Us too.

Amber Gill’s Miss Pap collection is available now.
